reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Carter is knowledgeable and approachable, but her exams are tough.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Excellent professor, explains concepts very clearly and is always available for help.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is good but sometimes goes too fast during lectures.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Brown's lectures are a bit disorganized, and the labs are very challenging.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Davis is passionate about the subject and makes the class enjoyable.

reviews.subject: English
reviews.review: Engaging lectures with plenty of class discussions, but grading is tough.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia has a wealth of knowledge and makes history come alive in class.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is insightful, but the readings are heavy.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Interesting lectures, but the exams are very tricky.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is an excellent professor who cares about her students.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Dr. White is very philosophical, but sometimes difficult to follow.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Great class discussions, but a lot of reading is required.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Passionate about art and makes every lecture interesting.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Clark is knowledgeable, but her grading is very strict.

reviews.subject: Computer Engineering
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis is difficult to understand, and the projects are very challenging.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: The material is tough, but Dr. Walker is always willing to help.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Young's class is engaging, but there is a lot of fieldwork.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Dr. King has a passion for literature and makes reading assignments enjoyable.

reviews.subject: Geology
reviews.review: Interesting lectures, but the exams are quite difficult.

reviews.subject: Ethics
reviews.review: Thought-provoking discussions, but be prepared to defend your views.
